properties.areaDesc: McKean; Cameron; Tioga; Warren; Elk; Potter
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 4:11AM EST until February 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
* WHAT...A period of snow will develop in the evening, becoming a
wintry mix around midnight. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Portions of the northern mountains of Pennsylvania.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways.

Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway
and traffic conditions.

To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook
page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
